title: I still stand by my request: Have Blitzcrank retract his arm after missing a Q!
body:
YOU NERFED THE WRONG ABILITY. 
Change his Q to retract after a failed grab!

Not only is it _aesthetically logical_, it would also add counterplay to his Q, which most would agree is at a frustrating position as an ability.

Elaboration on the aesthetics of his Q: currently if Blitzcrank were to miss his Q (say it is dodged), the skillshot (arm-tube, fist) disappears _**immediately**_ after reaching max range, an illogical movement for a skillshot that is physically attached to the champion.

Counterplay: Ending "Lag" for his Q would provide an opportunity to attack Blitzcrank, as punishment for missing a key skillshot for engagement, and usually a guaranteed kill.

Please notice my proposal, and consider this change.
